abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL plans to hold regular-season game in China as early as 2018 as means of expanding international audience and revenue; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The league, eager to expand its footprint internationally to generate more revenue, plans to play a game in China as early as 2018, but immense logistics must be solved.

headline.main: N.F.L. Aims to Play Regular-Season Game in China
headline.print_headline: League Wants to Add a Game in China to Its Global Spread

snippet: The league, eager to expand its footprint internationally to generate more revenue, plans to play a game in China as early as 2018, but immense logistics must be solved.
